LanguageData.RK_Gunlance_NormalType.label: Ratkin gunlance (standard)
LanguageData.RK_Gunlance_NormalType.description:
A lance equipped with the ability to fire shells. Its distinctive feature is its ability to shoot blank shells that explode in front of the user.

"Wyvern's Fire": Fires off a huge explosion; Use with caution, as it is far more powerful than you can imagine.

This particular gunlance is designed to fire standard shells for close-ranged combat.

LanguageData.RK_Gunlance_SpreadType.label: Ratkin gunlance (spread)
LanguageData.RK_Gunlance_SpreadType.description:
A lance equipped with the ability to fire shells. Its distinctive feature is its ability to shoot blank shells that explode in front of the user.

"Wyvern's Fire": Fires off a huge explosion; Use with caution, as it is far more powerful than you can imagine.

This particular gunlance is designed to fire a special high-spread variant of shells, which explodes over a wider area and sets enemies on fire.
